isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - DESCRIPTION - AIR INTAKES

svcproc.title: AIR INTAKES
svcproc.para: On the 2500 and 2600 models with original hood, air is taken in at the top of the grille above the radiator through a air duct to the air cleaner ( Figure 23).

figure.caption: Figure 23. 2500 and 2600 Model Air Intake (Original Hood)

svcproc.para: On the new aerodynamic hood of the 2600 model (after March 1996), air is taken in at the top of the grille through ducting built into the hood to the air cleaner ( Figure 24).

figure.caption: Figure 24. 2600 Model Air Intake (After March 1996) and 8200 Model Air Intake

svcproc.para: On the 4000 series, air is taken in at the top of the grille through ducting built into the hood to the air cleaner. The intake air is routed through five 90 degree turns to remove particles and moisture, eliminating the need for a pre- cleaner ( Figure 25).

On the 8100 model, air is taken in at the top of the grille through ducting built into the hood to the air cleaner. The intake air is routed through five 90 degree turns to remove particles and moisture, eliminating the need for a pre- cleaner ( Figure 26).
On the 8200 model, air is taken in at the top of the grille through ducting built into the hood to the air cleaner ( Figure 24).
